sentences.english: Oh, this is how the kind of house inhabited by Hemudu primitives looks like.
sentences.chinese: 原來河姆渡人住過的房子是這樣的。

sentences.english: Water is the most important medium that has accomplished the value and reputation of Hemudu Site.
sentences.chinese: 水，是成就河姆渡遺址價值和聲譽最關鍵的媒介。

sentences.english: The Folk Paper-cutting in Yuyao dates back to the old civilization of Hemudu.
sentences.chinese: 餘姚民間剪紙源於河姆渡古文化。
